text:
CHARLES A. HALLECK
WASHINGTON ADDRESS:
2204 Rayburn House Optic* Building
Washington, O.C.
HOME ADDRESS:
Rensselaer, Indiana
CONGRESS OF THE UNITED STATES
HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
WASHINGTON. D.C.
RECEIVED
5 MAR 4 1968
February 29, 1968 Radio Station IBM
Mr, John R. DeCamp
Manager
Station WBAA
Purdue University
Lafayette, Indiana 47907
Dear Mr. DeCamp:
My understanding is that the Senate Judiciary may well
report out E.R. 2512, which passed the House of RepreÂ¬
sentatives April 11, 1967, instead of S. 597. What
modifications the Senate might make in the House version
I have no way of knowing, of course.
Should the measure he passed by the Senate and then go
to conference, I will be glad to do what I can to be
helpful along the lines you suggest.
Sincerely,
Charles A. Halleck
CAE/Ah
